title: 25k01. Personal health care at home.
text:
Trained personnel such as nurses, whether registered or practical, are
not exempt under Sec 13(a)(15). See also FOH 10c16. However, registered nurses
may be exempt as professional employees under See 13(a)(1) depending on the
facts.
html: Trained personnel such as nurses, whether registered or practical, are not exempt under Sec 13(a)(15). See also FOH 10c16. However, registered nurses may be exempt as professional employees under See 13(a)(1) depending on the facts.
